title: Elo EDA and models
description: General informationThis kernel is dedicated to EDA of Elo Merchant Category Recommendation competition as well as feature engineering. In this dataset we can see clients who use Elo and their transactions. We need to predict the loyalty score for each card_id. Work in progress.
